name: Hand Rider
description:
***Not (Necessarily) Safe For Work*** — Contains vulgar references.

Hand Rider

You play as Little Dude on his flying hand.

Swat or shoot juice at the enemies to save the world!

  • WASD to move, Space to shoot/swat
  • E to change weapon
